comment.author: 94003007@N03
comment._content: Nieuport 83 - as per markings under aileron

comment.author: 87063764@N02
comment._content: Lt. Floyd (or Lloyd) B. Vorhies, from Alva, Oklahoma,   killed in crash 11 July 1918. Nieuport type 83, N. 10587.  There is another photo of Nieuport 27 N.8441 labeled as Vorhies' crash.  Either could be his, but they are two separate airplanes.
